Txt_Talk_DreamWaterFall_DreamSpace_MAIN_.Text: If you can hear me, follow the sound of my voice...

Txt_Talk_DreamWaterFall_Cliff_MAIN_0_VOL.Text:
{HERO}... {HERO}...
Can you hear me, {HERO}...?

I am she who watches over all...
One day, not long from now, you will appear before me a true hero...

But before your journey can begin, you must teach me something...
Teach me what manner of person you are...

You must answer my questions as honestly as you are able...
Are you ready to begin...?
You are a wary soul... Or perhaps you are merely wilful and contrary... We shall soon see...

But not before you are ready...
I can wait... I have all the time in the world...

Very well...
First, you must tell me your true name...<NO_INPUT>
What is the month of your birth...?<NO_INPUT>
And the day...?<NO_INPUT>

You were born on the {DAY} day of the month of {MONTH}...
Your sign is the one known in your world as {WORD2}... Is this correct...?
Very good, <DefSgl_WORD>...
I will now ask you a series of questions...

Do not dwell upon them too deeply...
Answer swiftly, and from the heart...
Do so, and I will come to know your true mind...
Now... Let us begin...
Do you find adventure to be more of a chore than a pleasure...?
Do you find life to be dull and uninteresting...?
Do you believe that the sun in the sky above is the king of all nature...?
Do you believe that victory can be won on the field of battle...?
When setting off on an adventure, is it better to have fine weapons and armour than fine companions...?
Do you enjoy whiling away the hours talking to the people of the towns and villages you visit...?
If you happen upon a cave, is your first urge to rush inside and see what you might find...?
Do you prefer spells and sorcery to swords and sweat...?
Do you often wonder how magical it might be to soar unaided through the skies...?
Do you envy the freedom of the birds...?
Do you find that you spend more money on weapons than on armour...?

Would you favour a cheaper, yet more distant hostelry over a nearer, yet more
costly establishment...?
Do you dream often...?
Do you ever dream of being pursued...?
Do you find the company of unfamiliar people tiresome...?
Do you trust in the words of those who tell fortunes...?
Upon seeing a troubled soul, is your first urge to go to their aid...?
Do you often find your head so full of thoughts that you are unable to sleep...?
If you could be reborn, would it be as a prince or a princess...?
Do you find yourself unable to refuse the requests of others...?
Are you able to prevent failure from preying upon your mind...?
Do you prefer the mountains to the sea...?
If you find yourself with nothing to do, does the lack of activity swiftly drive you to distraction...?
Do you enjoy physical pursuits...?

Do you find yourself unable to argue with others, even if you disagree with
them strongly...?
Do you find cats more endearing than dogs...?
Do you believe that it is wrong to fall for the beloved of a close friend...?
Do you have the self-belief to trust that you are in the right no matter what may come...?
When inspiration strikes, are you likely to spring into action straight away...?
Can even the most minor of matters irritate you...?
Do you believe that a promise, once made, can under no circumstances be broken...?
Do you believe in a power higher than that of man...?
Do you often drift off on flights of fancy...?
Were you to be granted a single wish, could you name it without a moment's hesitation...?
Once you begin a task, do you find that all else around you pales into insignificance...?
Is there something in your life that you would protect at the expense of all else...?
Is your circle of acquaintances wide and varied...?
Do you often dwell on days gone by...?
Do you pay much heed to the gossip of others...?
Do you believe the world to be filled more with sadness than with joy...?
When dining, do you leave the most delicious item on your plate till last...?
You are walking along, and trip over a pebble... Is this more your fault than that of the stone...?
Do you take great care over your appearance...?
Do you find yourself blushing when praised by others...?
If you are deceived by another, do you believe the blame lies at least in part with your own carelessness...?
Did you ever wish that you were grown to adulthood before your time...?
If you cannot have that which you desire, do you crave it all the more...?
Do you believe that if you hold onto a dream for long enough, it may one day come true...?

Do not attempt to deceive me...
You told me earlier that you do not enjoy physical pursuits...
No matter... Let us move on to the final test of your character...

Interesting... Very interesting indeed...
I feel that I know you a little better now...
Now, let us move on to the final test of your character...

I am she who watches over all...
And I have seen what manner of person you are...

This is your spirit... Your soul...
The essence of your character...
Now, my child... Very soon the dawn will break, and you will rise to greet the new day...

I am she who watches over all...
And I look forward to the time when you and I come face-to-face at last...
{HERO}... I sense that you are something of a daydreamer...
You are kind to others, and this kindness is effortless and heartfelt, making it easy for others to grow fond of you...
However, you tend to suppress your own thoughts and feelings in your quest to be liked...
And you are perhaps inclined to daydream, making you less active than you might otherwise be...
You must focus on believing in yourself more... On carving out your own path...
{HERO}... Others see you as relaxed... As calm and collected...

But this calm is only skin-deep...
Your heart seethes with all manner of conflicting feelings...
You do not develop close relationships with others, but deep down, you crave their company...
You must focus on opening yourself up... On sharing your thoughts and feelings...

Do so, and you will finally find the lifelong friends you so crave...
And you will never be lonely again...
{HERO}... I sense a certain...weariness in you...
You are the type of person who believes that things never go their way... That they are cursed to suffer bad luck forever...
You blame your lack of enthusiasm and your inaction on others...

But, in truth, it is your own indolence
that is to blame... You must learn to be
more positive, more active, more...alive...
{HERO}... You are something of a show-off, are you not...?
You have extremely high ideals, which is not in itself a bad thing, but you struggle when they do not match up to reality...
Your worst feature is your tendency to constantly compare yourself with others...
You must learn to accept yourself as you are... To enjoy life... To take things as they come...
{HERO}... You are what one might call a plugger...

Though the times may be hard...
Though the future may be dark...
You are never discouraged...
You simply knuckle down, and press onward toward your goal...
At times, you may be frustrated, but what matters is that you carry on...

And yet... Though you remain cheerful
and light-hearted, though your tenacity
wins you admiration, one day, you will tire...
You must find someone who accepts you as you are... Someone in whose company you do not need to struggle...
{HERO}... You are one of life's strugglers...
You may seem quietly competent to others, but unbeknown to them, your life is a constant battle...
And though you devote yourself tirelessly to the things you love, you have no time for those you do not...
If you learn to strive even at the things you do not enjoy, perhaps there you will find your strength...
{HERO}... You are someone who is not happy unless they are giving their all...
And you are capable of enduring great hardship without faltering or losing heart...
You prefer to solve your problems by yourself rather than burden others with them...
But this self-reliance has given rise to conceitedness, which leads you to make mistakes...
But even in the face of such failures, you are never daunted or fazed... It is here that your greatest strength lies...
Failure to you is merely the opportunity to seek a better solution... You are truly a <6>tough cookie<9>...
{HERO}... It seems you are something of a narcissist...
No matter what those around you may say, your way is best, and you will not follow any other path...
Your broad and varied interests prove that you are not wholly closed-minded, but your enthusiasm dies as quickly as it is kindled...
You are often a burden to others, but miraculously, they do not seem to dislike you for it...

Selfish, yet likeable...
This is you in a nutshell...
{HERO}... You can best be described as a sore loser...
In the company of others, you are not content unless you are the centre of attention...
You recognise this in yourself, and try hard to conceal it...
But before you know it, you have brought the topic of conversation around to yourself again...
However, your fear of failure makes you tenacious, which compensates somewhat for your shortcomings...
{HERO}... You are a scatterbrained soul...
Your interests are many and varied, and you do not hesitate to pursue them<--->to the detriment of all else around you...
Perhaps because of this, you fail as often as you succeed, and are prone to self-indulgent soul-searching...
But your changeable moods keep you from brooding for too long, and you are soon rushing into something else...
Your greatest strength lies in your ability to always remain forward-looking and proactive...
But you must try to remember to stop every once in a while and take notice of what is going on around you...

{HERO}... Are you familiar with the expression <6>straight arrow<9>...?
It describes you perfectly...
You may not realise it, but you are incapable of lying... Your dishonesty shows instantly on your face...
And you are as impressionable as you are honest, often becoming swept up in events around you...
Fear of failure may make you overcautious at times...
So you must strive to overcome it, and learn to act decisively and boldly...
Do so, and you may find a new self waiting within...
{HERO}... Forgive me, but you are as stubborn as a mule...
At first glance, you may seem gregarious, but you do not listen to others, and seek only to force your opinions upon them...
You may appear to love the new, but in truth, you fear change, and are unable to alter your opinions or preferences...
Being a skilled social manipulator, however, you are able to keep this truth hidden from view...
Because of this, few around you know how stubborn you truly are...
But as you grow older, you will attempt to hide this aspect of your nature less and less...
And eventually, friends and family will begin to notice your tendency to dig in your heels...
But then, we all grow stubborn with age, so perhaps it does not matter after all...
{HERO}... Sadly, it seems you are something of a crybaby...
You may see yourself as aloof and level-headed, but in truth, you are a deeply sentimental soul...
Though you try your hardest to be a tough, independent individual, you are nothing of the sort...
But this is not necessarily a bad thing... No one in this world is truly independent, after all...
If there is one thing you must work on, it is your temper, which you are no more able to control than your tears...
{HERO}... You are a firm believer in individuality... In travelling the path less trodden...

You try to be, and succeed in being, a tough, independent individual...
An all-round cool customer, if you will...
Even with close friends, you keep a certain distance, and always remain aloof...
This may lead others to feel that you are difficult to relate to...
And you yourself may even feel lonely at times... But then, isn't everybody lonely deep down...?
You will undoubtedly come to this realisation eventually...
And when at last you do, there will be no one there to comfort you...
For you are a lone wolf, destined to walk alone...

{HERO}... To be honest...
You are immature... Boorish...
An unreconstructed lout...
You may not think that you are, but this is merely further proof of your immaturity...
You are incapable of getting along with others, and often cause offence without realising...
And though you may grow older, you will never grow wiser... The child within you will always remain...
You are hard on others, yet easy on yourself...
Perhaps if you knew true hardship, you might change... But you are unlikely ever to undergo it voluntarily...
Therefore, the best we can hope for is that you learn to treat those around you with a little more consideration...
{HERO}... You are a free spirit...
Whatever you do, you do it at your own pace, on your own terms, and you take as much time as you feel it requires...
However, your weakness lies in your tendency to panic when pressured by others...
And when you panic, you make mistakes...
Therefore, you must learn to remain unperturbed, no matter what may come...
Only then will you be able to convince others that you are not the fool they sometimes think you are...
The ability to remain calm under pressure is within you... I sense it... I know it is there...
{HERO}... You really are quite the show-off...
But you are no ordinary show-off...
You are the kind of show-off who believes that they were chosen... That they are unique... Special, even...
Because of this, you delight in being different... In behaving in a way that others do not...
For you, there is no greater pleasure than to be told that you are strange or unusual...
And the more your behaviour elicits such a response, the happier you become...
But you must not allow your head to become too swollen by the attention you so crave...
You may see a bulbous head as yet another hilarious eccentricity, but others will not...
In fact, it may be what finally turns you from hilarious to ridiculous in their eyes...
{HERO}... You like to think of yourself as something of a slippery devil...
You judge all situations in terms of personal loss and gain...
And you judge people in the same way... You will only associate with those from whom you might benefit...
For this reason, you love nothing more than the rich and famous...
Or anyone else from whom you think you might gain something...
In the presence of such people, you do your utmost to appeal to them... To ingratiate yourself...
But of course, you almost never succeed... After all, what can they hope to gain from you...?
Sadly, you fail to see this, and blame them, cursing them for putting on airs...
And on the rare occasion that such a person does deign to associate with you, things go no more smoothly...
You are so enamoured with them, so blinded by admiration, that you can hardly function...
But they, of course, think little of you...
Perhaps one day you will learn...

They are not the important ones...
Your oldest and closest friends...
Those are the ones who truly matter...
Your supposedly important friends barely know your name, and would never lift a finger for your sake...
It is your true friends who will come to your aid in times of need...
Until you realise this, you will not be half so wily as you believe...
{HERO}... You are shy and retiring... A shrinking violet...
You fully intend to push yourself to the foreground, but somehow always find yourself at the back of the room...
And although you may dislike how others treat you, you never quite find the courage to speak out...
Naturally, you pale at the thought of meeting new people...
This is why you always fail to make an impact in the presence of others...
<6>Oh! I didn't see you standing there!<9> How many times have you heard these words...?
And when they are spoken, all you can do is blush and giggle...
But this is not the real you...
Deep in your heart, you want nothing more than to stand out from the crowd...
You are forever imagining doing something incredible... Something that will make people say <6>wow<9>...
But, shrinking violet that you are, you believe that you are incapable, and give up before you have even begun...
Such deeds are not beyond you, however... As with everything in life, you must acclimatise yourself slowly...

Taken one step at a time, no peak is insurmountable...
You can grow accustomed to anything...
Do not attempt to achieve great things right away... Begin instead with the small things...
A whisper one day can grow to a shout the next... Ah, but please do not teach yourself to shout all the time...
That would merely be annoying...
{HERO}... You are what some would describe as an <6>egghead<9>...
I do not mean that your head is shaped like an egg, of course...

I mean that you have a large, well-formed brain, gifted in thought...
But perhaps not so much in action...
If a once-in-a-lifetime chance were to come along, you may not act quickly enough to take it...
But this is not necessarily reason to mourn...
After all, many deadly traps come disguised as once-in-a-lifetime chances...
You are wise enough to recognise this, but others may simply see it as an excuse...
Perhaps, from time to time, it might be better to act without thinking quite so deeply...
In doing so, you may make a mistake or two, but mistakes are there to teach us...
And perhaps you will earn a more flattering nickname than <6>egghead<9> in the process...
Unless your head really is shaped like an egg, of course... If so, I fear I cannot help you...
{HERO}... You are more of a wimp than I would have imagined...
You may not think so, but I see all things...
You are afraid to act decisively...
You are too cautious... You will only ever take a risk if you know there is a safety net in place...
However, this is not necessarily a bad thing...
Indeed, it is preferable to taking a risk and failing with irreversible consequences...
You may live an unremarkable life, but it is sure to be one of safety and relative contentment...
Provided, that is, you are mindful of your tendency to trust in others too readily... Beware liars and tricksters...
Fail to do so, and all your caution may be for naught... You may find yourself dressed in the emperor's new clothes...
And your nearest and dearest may not wish to see you walking naked down the street...

So please, be wary of charlatans...
And if you wish to impress your friends,
consider a less shocking means...
{HERO}... I am sorry to inform you that you are a spoilt brat...
You wish to appear strong and self-reliant, but without the constant support of others, you are helpless...
In order to try and hide this weakness, you often overstretch yourself...
But this is not necessarily a bad thing...
For in overstretching ourselves, we make effort, and in effort lies true betterment...
Who knows...perhaps one day you will become truly self-reliant... That will surely impress your friends...
Why...? Because your friends, too, cannot survive without the support of others... None of us can...

In this sense, we are all spoilt brats...
May this knowledge help you to know yourself and others...
{HERO}... It is rare indeed for one so powerful to be so kind... You are a veritable paragon of virtue...
Yours is a dominant and forceful personality, but you are able to keep it masterfully in check...
You are also highly compassionate, and capable of putting yourself in almost anybody's shoes...
And you always place more importance on the hopes and fears of others than on your own...
You are deeply passionate, and never allow anything to dampen your spirits...
Thanks to this, everyone you meet finds it easy to trust you...
And you are able to respond to and reward that trust effortlessly...
In short, you are an incredible person...
And if this description does not currently become you, have faith that it soon will...

Let me say it again...
You are an incredible person...

And if you do not feel like one yet...
You must strive to become one...

{HERO}... You are careless...
Something of a klutz, in fact...
Why do I say this...? Because you did not finish the task at hand... You left survivors in your wake...
Upon hearing this, no doubt you will trip over yourself in your rush to return to the village...
And in doing so, you will prove yet more clearly how clumsy and careless you are...
Unless you are able to act calmly and with consideration, you will never reach my dwelling place...
Perhaps you are not destined to be a hero at all...

But I have no choice...
I can call upon no other...
Forgive me... I do not mean to belittle you... I must will myself to believe in you...
I pray that you do not fail me...
{HERO}... You appear to be something of a thug...
And though you may not realise it, your thuggishness is a worry and an inconvenience to all around you...
Have you ever stopped to consider the effect you have on others...?
Even had you done so, your lack of empathy would probably lead you to assume that they think as you do...
But this is not so... We all think and feel differently... To assume that we do not is a grave error...
Sadly, you have yet to understand this...
Perhaps you think that to attribute your thoughts to others is to exercise empathy...? It is not...
Your friends almost certainly worry about you, but they do not mention it for fear of a violent reaction...
Carry on as you are, and before long, you will have no friends left at all...
Please... Try to yield a little to others... To be considerate... To be...caring...

It may be too late for you to change...
But you must try... Convince at least
one person to have faith in you...
And hold onto that person with all of your considerable might...
{HERO}... You are something of an idealist...
You are gifted with a strong sense of justice, and an even stronger sense of purpose... You are also kind to others...
I would like to be able to tell you that these qualities endear you to those around you...

But sadly, this is not the case...
And why might this be...?
You may not believe the answer...

It is because, deep down, they are not as strong as you...
Their hearts are weak...
And so, being with you... Being in the presence of such strength... It frustrates and upsets them...
Perhaps if you learn to show your more vulnerable side, people will come to enjoy your company more...
But then, your strength of character is no bad thing... Perhaps it is others, not you, who must change...

{HERO}... You are a risk-taker...
A thrill-seeker... A daredevil...
You do not think of the future, you live in the now... No sooner have you decided to do something than it is done...
And in the face of failure, you do not give up... You do not grieve... You simply dust yourself off and try again...
But because of this, you are liable to make the same mistakes time and again without realising...
This may be no bad thing in itself, but every once in a while, a mistake may change, or even cost, a life...
And if it does, you may for the first time have cause to dwell on your lack of forethought... Albeit too late...
If such a day should come, you will have no choice but to bear the responsibility for your failure...

And in doing so, perhaps you will become a stronger, better person...
Perhaps even a great one...
But then again, perhaps your luck will hold... Perhaps you will never make such a mistake... Only time will tell...
{HERO}... Do not attempt to hide your true nature from me... I see the irrepressible flirt within...
You may blush...but you have long suspected the truth...
You have felt your real self lurking beneath the surface...
Though you hide it well, the truth is that your romantic urges are stronger than those of others...
Though you hide it well, the truth is that your romantic urges are stronger than those of others...
You often find yourself daydreaming about the current object of your affections...

Doodling their name in the margins of your notebook...
Seeing their face in the clouds...
And when you do, a secret smile spreads itself across your face...
You sometimes wonder if you might be a little more obsessed with the art of love than those around you...

Well, let me put your mind at rest...
You are...

But there is no need to worry...
This is an entirely natural and healthy thing...
{HERO}... You are truly gifted... Few are as clever as you...
You are an incredibly quick thinker whose mind moves from one subject to the next with ease...
This makes you a gifted conversationalist, and the life and soul of any party...
Which in turn leads to a slight tendency to try to be all things to all men... Not that this is necessarily a bad thing...
After all, it is only natural to want to be liked, and it cannot be denied that you make people happy...
No, your will to endear yourself is not your true failing...
Your true failing lies in your keen awareness of your own intelligence, and your habit of seeing others as lacking in this respect...
There simmers within you the tendency to belittle or mock people for what you see as their shortcomings...
When someone makes a careless blunder, you invariably manage to stop yourself from saying something...
But deep within your heart of hearts, you secretly pity their clumsiness...
Of course, your silent disdain rarely surfaces...
This is because you are clever enough to realise its potential to wound, and to sadden...
And because of this, you believe that it does not affect your relationships with others...
And on the surface, this would seem to be entirely true...
However, the people around you do notice...
They notice your tendency to wield your intellect as a weapon... Your calculated behaviour...
But they would never tell you this...
Because they are clever enough to realise its potential to wound... And to sadden...
Yes... It is true... They are as intelligent as you in that respect... Almost everyone is...
So perhaps you should learn to treat them with a little more respect...
If you do not, your witticisms may come to grate rather than ingratiate...
{HERO}... You are that classic character... The irrepressible clown...
When others are engaged in serious conversation, you are busy trying to think of ways to make them laugh...
When you see someone working away seriously at something, your first urge is to lift their spirits with a joke...
You are always making others laugh, and for this, you are well-loved...

But look within... Is this the real you?
I think you know the answer...
Underneath it all, you are a delicate soul... Easily hurt, and quick to sadden...
So you wrap your true self up in the armour of japery for fear of being hurt...

One who uses humour to deflect attention from their true self...
This perhaps describes you best...
But it cannot last forever...
As you grow older, your jokes will inevitably grow tired...
And one day, no one will be laughing any more...
When that day comes, you will yearn for years gone by...
But it will be too late... That is why you must learn to take things seriously<--->lest your whole life become a bad joke...
{HERO}... You are what some call a thoroughly <6>good egg<9>...
You are incredibly considerate, and able to see things from almost anyone's perspective...
But this is both a blessing and a curse... At times it stops you from quickly reaching a decision...
After all, to choose one thing is to reject another...
And rejection is just not in your nature...
This tendency also informs other areas of your life...
For example, you find it difficult to part with possessions...
Broken toys... Brochures from old holidays... Ticket stubs...
You are so sentimental, you might even keep a single ill-fitting sock...
And because of this, your cupboards and drawers overflow with trinkets, mementos and souvenirs...
This mountain of mess is testament to your great kindness, but others do not see it as such...
They believe that you are simply too lazy to throw anything away...

And this may even be partly true...
You should think about having a tidy every now and again...
{HERO}... You are entirely free of sentiment or sadness...
You are always grinning from ear to ear, and those around you often wonder what you are thinking to make you so happy...
But the truth is that, more often than not, you are not thinking anything at all...
Of course, a person cannot be entirely free of worry... You too have your times of trouble...
But you know that no good can come of fretting fruitlessly...
...And that somehow, everything will work itself out in the end...
And most of the time, it does...
Most worries turn out to be just that<--->unfounded concerns, and nothing more...
And so you live your life in what may well be the only lasting form of happiness...
Carefree, empty-headed bliss...
A happy camper to the end...
